text.0: i praise the god of wondrous might like indra the lovely pleasant guest whom all must welcome.
text.1: may agni priest and master of the household give hero strength and allsustaining riches.
text.2: o agni graciously accept this song of mine thou passingwise who knowest every ordinance.
text.3: enwrapped in holy oil further the course of prayer the gods bestow according to thy holy law.
text.4: immortal wandering round the seven stations give a liberal giver to the pious worshipper.
text.5: wealth agni with brave sons and ready for his use welcome the man who comes with fuel unto thee.
text.6: the seven who bring oblations worship thee the strong the first the great chief priest ensign of sacrifice.
text.7: the oilanointed bull agni who hears who sends as god full hero strength to him who freely gives.
text.8: first messenger art thou meet for election drink thou thy fill invited to the anirta.
text.9: the maruts in the votarys house adorned thee with lauds the bhṛgus gave thee light and glory.
text.10: milking the teeming cow for allsustaining food o wise one for the worshiploving worshipper.
text.11: thou agni dropping oil thrice lighting works of law showest thy wisdom circling home and sacrifice.
text.12: they who at flushing of this dawn appointed thee their messenger these men have paid thee reverence.
text.13: gods strengthened thee for work that must be glorified agni while they made butter pure for sacrifice.
text.14: arrangers in our synods agni while they sang vasisistha s sons have called thee down the potent one.
text.15: maintain the growth of wealth with men who sacrifice ye gods preserve us with your blessings evermore.
